content: **note from the designer ** *classic beanie with turned back brim and oversized pom pom dream up your own colour combinations * **level - easy knitting** sizes - small medium large **measurements ** to fit head - 54cm 56cm 58cm **materials ** 1st colour c1 - 1 1 1 ball 2nd colour c2 - 1 1 1 ball **needles and extras ** 1 pair each 3 75mm uk 9 and 4 00mm uk 8 knitting needles or size needed to give correct gauge wool needle for sewing seam pom pom maker or piece of cardboard also at yarnspirations https //www yarnspirations com/red-heart-2-color-beanie/rhk0816-015800m html
